Rewards for clearing the main story Hero
A mysterious key with the power to change destiny，which can be used to summon the Hero.
column4: 擁有改變命運的力量的神秘鑰匙，使用後可召喚星神。

column2: The Star Key， which is affected by the power of Lilim's mind， can summon the designated Hero after use.
column4: 受莉莉姆的心意之力影響的星之鑰，使用後可召喚指定星神。

column2: It has the mysterious key to summon the glorious power of Journey. After using it， you can summon the Hero of Journey and receive prop rewards.
column4: 擁有召喚征途光耀力量的神秘鑰匙，使用後可召喚征途星神與道具獎勵。

column2: It has the mysterious key to summon the power of Zhengtu Yueye. After using it， you can summon the Zhengtu Hero and prop rewards with limited probability.
column4: 擁有召喚征途月夜力量的神秘鑰匙，使用後可召喚限時概率的征途星神與道具獎勵。

column2: A precious key with the power to summon souls， which can be used to summon star souls.
column4: 擁有喚魂力量的珍貴鑰匙，使用後可召喚星魂。

column2: A precious key with the power to summon souls， which can be used to summon star souls.
column4: 擁有喚魂力量的珍貴鑰匙，使用後可召喚星魂。

column2: The orb containing a small amount of star source can provide the star god with 100 experience points.。
column4: 蘊藏著少量星源的寶珠，可以為星神提供100點經驗值。

column2: Orbs containing ordinary star sources can provide the Star God with 500 experience points.
column4: 蘊藏著一般星源的寶珠，可以為星神提供500點經驗值。

column2: There are many star-source orbs that can provide the Star God with 2500 experience points.
column4: 蘊藏著不少星源的寶珠，可以為星神提供2500點經驗值。

column2: The orbs containing a large number of star sources can provide the Star God with 10000 experience points.
column4: 蘊藏著大量星源的寶珠，可以為星神提供10000點經驗值。

column2: After use， the combat circuit can be increased by 50 experience points.

column2: A memory card that stores simulated battle data and is used to strengthen the main god card.
column4: 儲存了模擬戰數據的記憶卡，用於主神卡強化。

column2: Specially purified water from the River Styx is used to overload the device.
column4: 經過特殊淨化的冥河河水，用於裝置超載。

column2: Ordinary gifts can be given to apostles to increase their loyalty.
column4: 普通的禮物，可以贈送給使徒，提升忠誠度。

column4: 貴重的禮物，可以贈送給使徒，提升忠誠度。

column2: A special crystal formed by the minerals in the Styx bed absorbing the soul remnants left by the heroic spirits who crossed the river and sublimating them over many years. Use it on a hero with 36 Level enabled equipment lithography。
column4: 冥河河床的礦物吸収渡河的英靈所遺留的靈魂殘滓後，經長年累月所昇華而成的特殊結晶，可用於36級開啟的裝備光刻。

column2: Rare crystals that are only exposed during the photolithography process are necessary for photolithography equipment，Use it on a hero with 36 Level-enabled equipment photolithography upgrade。
column4: 只會在光刻的過程中表露本體的稀有晶石，是裝備光刻的必需品，可用於36級開啟的裝備光刻升階。

column2: Key intelligence identified from massive simulated battle data，Use it on a hero with 提升主神卡星级。
column4: 從海量的模擬戰數據中查明的關鍵情報，可用於提升主神卡星級。

column2: The compass that is said to be able to guide the user towards the most ideal future is used to awaken the Star God UR and stimulate the Star God's potential.
column4: 傳說中能夠引導使用者邁向最理想的未來的羅盤，用於星神UR覺醒，激發星神潛能。

column2: Born by gathering the power of many star souls，it contains the crystallization of the power to destroy evil.，Use it on a hero with 50 Star hourglass activated at level 1，used when awakening the star gathering skill。
column4: 通過集結眾多星魂之力而誕生，蘊含著破邪之力的結晶，可用於50級開啟的星之沙漏，覺醒集星技能時使用。

column2: The mallet contains mysterious power，which can stimulate the potential energy in the equipment and is used to awaken the equipment opened at level 70.
column4: 蘊含神秘力量的槌，可以激發裝備內的潛在能量，用於70級開啟的裝備覺醒。

column2: Proof of passing the Special Trial of the Gods is used to upgrade the godhood to [Level 3 Holy God] and [Level 1 Super God] and subsequent godhood.
column4: 通過眾神特級試煉的證明，用於將神格升至【三級聖神】與【一級超神】及後續神格。

column2: The proof of passing the Super Trial of the Gods is used to upgrade the godhood to [Level 1 Holy God] and [Level 2 Holy God].
column4: 通過眾神超級試煉的證明，用於將神格升至【一級聖神】與【二級聖神】。

column2: Proof of passing the advanced trials of the gods is used to upgrade the godhood to [Level 3 God] and [Level 4 God].
column4: 通過眾神高級試煉的證明，用於將神格升至【三級神】與【四級神】。

column2: Proof of passing the Intermediate Trial of the Gods is used to upgrade the godhood to [First Level God] and [Second Level God].
column4: 通過眾神中級試煉的證明，用於將神格升至【一級神】與【二級神】。

column2: The proof of passing the primary trials of the gods is used to upgrade the godhood to [demigod] and [trainee god].
column4: 通過眾神初級試煉的證明，用於將神格升至【半神】與【見習神】。

column2: Life enhancement chips can be used to strengthen the beast gods and improve the attributes of all star gods.
column4: 生命強化晶片，可用於強化獸神，提升全體星神屬性。

column2: Defense enhancement chips can be used to strengthen the Beast God and improve the attributes of all Star Gods.
column4: 防禦強化晶片，可用於強化獸神，提升全體星神屬性。

column2: Attack enhancement chips can be used to strengthen the Beast God and improve the attributes of all Star Gods.
column4: 攻擊強化晶片，可用於強化獸神，提升全體星神屬性。

column2: A special instruction used to increase the level of the beast god's contract pattern.
column4: 用於提升獸神的契約紋等級的特殊指令。

column2: A rare flower that grows somewhere in the divine realm， symbolizing pure and flawless love. Used to unlock the image of the Star God.
column4: 長於神界某處的稀少花朵，象徵純潔無瑕的愛。用於解鎖星神形象。

column2: The nutrient solution specially prepared by the God of Medicine can increase the character's physical strength by 50 points after use.
column4: 醫神特製營養液，使用後增加角色50點體力。

column2: A special spirit-enhancing agent made by the God of Medicine， which increases the character's spiritual power by 10 points after use.
column4: 醫神特製增靈劑，使用後增加角色10點靈力。

column2: A magical crystal that contains the power of the Styx's protection and rests on the bed of the Styx.
column4: 蘊藏著冥河加護的力量，長眠於冥河河床的神奇晶石。

column2: Can be used to exchange for Star God appearance.
column4: 可以用於兌換星神造型。

column2: It can be used in the Star Soul Store to exchange for Star Soul.
column4: 可以用於星魂商店兌換星魂。

column2: Can be used to redeem goods in the guild store.
column4: 可以用於公會商店兌換商品。

column2: Can be used to exchange for goods in the exchange store.
column4: 可以用於競技商店兌換商品。

column2: Can be used to exchange for goods in the exchange store.
column4: 可以用於兌換商店兌換商品。

column2: It can be used to exchange for goods in the Galaxy Store. After the store closes， each item will be recycled with 40 Sunstones.
column4: 可以用於銀河商店兌換商品，商店關閉後每個以40日冕石回收。

column2: Level I wisdom is used to advance to the Star God level. Legend has it that it can provide the user with the wisdom to win battles.
column4: I級智慧之實，用於星神進階。傳說中能夠為使用者提供打勝仗的叡智。

column2: Level I Hero's Crown is used for star god advancement. Legend has it that it can give the user the courage to face powerful enemies.
column4: I級Hero's Crown，用於星神進階。傳說中能夠為使用者帶來面對強敵的勇氣。

column2: Level I Cup of dreams is used for star god advancement. Legend has it that it can fulfill any wish of the user
column4: I級夢現之杯，用於星神進階。傳說中能夠實現使用者任何願望的聖杯。

column2: Level I Feather of Power is used for star god advancement. Legend has it that it can provide the user with the power to protect the things they hold dear.
column4: I級Feather of Power，用於星神進階。傳說中能夠為使用者提供守護珍視之物的力量。
